name: Wowie!
description:
This is the game for my first game jam, Wowie Jam 3.0. Wowie Jam is hosted by Jonas Tyroller.

Because of my big genius brain plan, my game is the most Wowie! of them all!

My main goals were Wowie! and Simplicity, so I hope my game gets rated well on that criteria.

Controls are simple:

  • W/A/S/D for movement
  • Movement of the mouse for rotating
  • Leftclick to shoot bullets
  • Shift to move faster
